CustomField.formula: IF ( (Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c) > 0, IF(TEXT(FLOOR((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c))) != "0",TEXT(FLOOR((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c))) & " day(s) ","") & IF(TEXT( FLOOR( 24 * ((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c) - FLOOR((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c)) )))!="0",TEXT( FLOOR( 24 * ((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c) - FLOOR((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c)) ))) & " hour(s) ","") & IF(TEXT( ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c) - FLOOR((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c)) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c) - FLOOR((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c)) ),8)) ),0)) != "0",TEXT( ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c) - FLOOR((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c)) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c) - FLOOR((Clockout_Date__c - Clockin_Date__c)) ),8)) ),0)) & " min(s) ","") , "")
CustomField.label: Daily Time
